Summary: triangle, bright lights on each point, smaller red flashing light in middle. white/grey panels in between lights
divs: sighting detailsat around 11:00 pm i went outside to smoke, right over our house was a triangalur object with large steady bright lights on each point and a smaller red flashing light in the middle. it had white\grey "panels" in between the lights it was tree top level or house top level as i could plainly see the bottom of it. it was quite, but i heard what i believe were jets but i couldn't see them as they were over the clouds and this object was way below the clouds. i watched it as i smoked, i was not afraid, surprised you bet. it began to slowly, very slowly move in a norhernly direction. i went in the house. at first i thougt it may be some kind of new military aircraft, the next day i watched ufo files and it was the exactly the same as the pictures of ufo's seen in belgium, then i about jumped out of my chair and wished i had thought of taking it's picture.
